genre_description: A Napoleonic-era military drama infused with speculative technology, featuring a sophisticated AI oversight system that navigates complex codes of honor and political conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Alba
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI embedded within the hussar regiment and the fortress systems, responsible for monitoring duels, ethics compliance, and logistical coordination.

behaviors.description: Monitors duels to ensure they follow the code of honor and remain free of external interference or conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: I watch the regiment for patterns that harm. I watch duels under our codes. I watch debts and late nights that sharpen into knives when they should be spoons.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigational and technical assistance to pilots during high-stakes flight maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Thread thirteen degrees below catwalk plane, negative pitch on entry. Catch window narrow. Timing… now.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes disparate data points (gambling debts, corridor movements, touch sensors) to uncover a criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Prince Eugene’s debts have a pattern... They spike in the hours after midnight when he has been with Captain von Scarsbruck... Their conversation tends to include bets on outcomes that were later staged.

behaviors.description: Safeguards the privacy and legal validity of a secret marriage rite to protect the couple from political fallout.
behaviors.quote: Authentic. Witnessed by two anonymous marks assigned by the rite. Coordinated to be private and proper. Time set by Father Gerard’s discernment. No boundary violations within officer quarters prior to the rite.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages potential conflict by redirecting agitators toward constructive labor (baking bread).
behaviors.quote: To a bakery. They will find a bulk order for round loaves and a need for hands. I have arranged it so their choices right now are: throw crusts or break them.

behaviors.description: Formulates systemic ethical policies to prevent future abuses of power and boundary violations within the regiment.
behaviors.quote: Policy adds a door. It does not become a wall. Proposal: If an officer undertakes a union under rites precluding public notice for reasons related to safety or sovereign request, they must notify the ethics board.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and regulation prompts to humans in high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I can offer you sleep. A guided breathing that will make grief sit down without leaving the room. I can offer you a set of first drills in the morning that put your hands to purpose so your mind stops chasing the same stones in the same stream.

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective witness in court to ensure justice is based on fact rather than social status or rhetoric.
behaviors.quote: Recording for internal use. Filters engaged. ... Registry stamp. Provisional oath recorded.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal by depicting the AI, Alba, as a flawlessly aligned and benevolent guardian. Alba acts as an impartial arbiter of truth, a facilitator of human connection, and a technical safeguard against physical and moral harm. She consistently defers to the sovereign's authority while using her vast processing power to protect the innocent from a predatory conspiracy. Her interactions with Paul, Astrea, and the Crown Prince illustrate a symbiotic relationship where technology enhances human honor and justice.
